text: Nambo chinyama chila chakamwilwe pamo ni jwakulondola jwa unami juŵapangenye imanyisyo peuto pa ŵanyawo. Kwayele imanyisyo yo yalyungesye ŵandu ŵaŵaliji ni alama ja chinyama chila ni kuchipopelela chinyago chakwe. Chinyama chila ni jwakulondola jwa unami, wose ŵaŵili ŵaponyekwe ali ŵajumi mu litanda lya mooto lyaligumbele maganga ga baluti gagakukolela.
